data.name: LUA: The Beginning of Downhill
data.detailed_description:
Join Lua in this adventure that combines downhill and fantasy. Dive into epic descents and take challenging corners using the magical power of root-shooting. Help Lua face her fears while riding downhill on a longboard through the mountains.



Master Lua's power in every corner and decide how to overcome each stage, through relaxing rides or at full speed, finding the fastest way to reach the finish line. Discover challenging shortcuts to get the highest score and overcome the fear on every descent.



Meet Lua while descending through amazing landscapes, listening to her favorite music album combining rock, blues and soul. Delve into Gelpi's exclusive tracks, which already has over 1M plays on Spotify.

Experience how the music takes over the game creating the perfect atmosphere between flow and adrenaline.

FEATURES

  • Master the power of root-shooting to grab onto the trees and take the corners better with the longboard.
  • Experience Downhill, a sport that teaches you that the only way to make fear disappear is to face it.
  • Explore the different mountains at your own pace or take the challenge and prove yourself against the clock to get the best score.
  • A journey of personal development where risk, courage and bravery take center stage.

    Play Lua with our free demo and let us know what you think on Discord. For us, the most important thing is to know what you think about it and that you are part of the growth of Lua.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: AMD FX-6100/Intel i3-3220 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 360 2GB/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti 2GB or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
